answers.text: You will import asymmetric CMKs to AWS KMS but allow KMS to convert them to symmetric keys.
You will import the asymmetric CMKs just as you have been asked.
You will say that you can only import 5 asymmetric CMKs into AWS KMS because that is a hard limit.
You will say that is impossible to do because AWS KMS cannot import asymmetric keys.

text: Your company has asked you to import 10 asymmetric CMKs into AWS KMS. What are you going to do?
